title: A Nation of Nations, The National Museum of History and Technology, Smithsonian Institution
medium: Offset lithography on white wove paper
description: Against a white field, an explosive assembly of small square brown and white photographic portraits of famous men and women.  The design is dense at the left center. Toward the edges of the cluster, the images are placed independently against the white background.  In bold red letters at lower right,  A Nation / of Nations.
name: Poster
